title: Sweden officially joins NATO
summary: Sweden became NATO’s 32nd member, marking a historic shift in the country’s security policy.

title: U.S. Supreme Court rules Trump eligible for ballots
summary: The U.S. Supreme Court ruled that Donald Trump could remain on state ballots despite legal challenges.

title: Pakistan elects new prime minister
summary: Shehbaz Sharif was elected prime minister by Pakistan’s parliament following inconclusive elections.

title: Haiti declares state of emergency
summary: Haiti’s government declared a state of emergency amid escalating gang violence and prison breaks.

title: Russia holds presidential election
summary: President Vladimir Putin secured another term in office after a tightly controlled election.

title: EU approves landmark AI regulation
summary: The European Union approved the world’s first comprehensive law regulating artificial intelligence.

title: Moscow concert hall attack kills dozens
summary: A deadly attack at a concert venue near Moscow killed dozens of people, prompting a major security response.

title: UN Security Council calls for Gaza ceasefire
summary: The UN Security Council adopted a resolution calling for an immediate ceasefire in Gaza.

title: Japan exits negative interest rates
summary: Japan’s central bank ended its negative interest rate policy for the first time in years.

title: Extreme heat hits South Asia
summary: Record-breaking heatwaves affected parts of India and Southeast Asia, raising health concerns.
